sentence.Network_en: Allegations of brutality and theft have been levelled at the army.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人指责军队中存在着野蛮暴行和盗窃行为。

sentence.Network_en: Her experience of men was of domination and brutality.
sentence.Network_cn: 男人给她的感受是支配一切，野蛮残暴。

sentence.Network_en: "You're well out of it," Christopher said with unconscious brutality.
sentence.Network_cn: “幸亏没你什么事儿，”克里斯托弗无意中冷冷地说道。

entry.def: Brutality is cruel and violent treatment or behaviour. A brutality is an instance of cruel and violent treatment or behaviour.

example.ex: Her experience of men was of domination and brutality.
example.tran: 男人给她的感受是支配一切，野蛮残暴。

sentences.en: The brutality of the crime has appalled the public.
sentences.cn: 罪行之残暴使公众大为震惊。

sentences.en: This was an act of extreme brutality.
sentences.cn: 这是一种极端野蛮的行为。

sentences.en: They accused the police of brutality.
sentences.cn: 他们谴责警察的野蛮行为。
